an10.96:2.3: kvettha → ko’ttha (bj) | ko tettha (si) | kvattha (pts1, mr)
an10.96:14.1: diṭṭhi → diṭṭhigatā (sabbattha), yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhiadhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamugghāto → yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā adhiṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ samugghāto (s1-3) | yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhāna adhiṭṭhāna pariyuṭṭhāna samuṭṭhāna samugghāto (pts1)
